title: David, Nabal, and Abigail
summary: After the death of Samuel, David asks a wealthy man named Nabal for provisions, but Nabal insults him. David prepares to take revenge, but Nabal’s wise wife Abigail intervenes. David praises her wisdom, and after Nabal dies, he marries her.

faq.question: Who was Abigail?
faq.answer: Nabal’s intelligent and discerning wife who stopped David from taking revenge.

faq.question: What happened to Nabal?
faq.answer: He had a heart attack (or stroke) after learning what Abigail did, and died ten days later.
